content: Plan a week-long road trip itinerary through the United States, including at least six cities to visit and one must-see attraction in each city. Present your response as a bullet-point list.

Road Trip Itinerary: Exploring the Best of the United States

Day 1-2: New York City, NY
- Must-see attraction: Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island
- Additional highlights: Central Park, Times Square, Metropolitan Museum of Art, Rockefeller Center, 9/11 Memorial & Museum

Day 3-4: Washington D.C., DC
- Must-see attraction: National Mall (including the Washington Monument, Lincoln Memorial, and World War II Memorial)
- Additional highlights: Smithsonian Museums, Capitol Building, White House, National Gallery of Art

Day 5-6: Nashville, TN
- Must-see attraction: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
- Additional highlights: Ryman Auditorium, Grand Ole Opry, Broadway District, Tennessee State Capitol, Parthenon in Centennial Park

Day 7-8: New Orleans, LA
- Must-see attraction: French Quarter
- Additional highlights: Bourbon Street, Jackson Square, St. Louis Cathedral, National WWII Museum, Preservation Hall, Cafe du Monde

Day 9-10: Austin, TX
- Must-see attraction: South Congress Avenue (SoCo)
- Additional highlights: Texas State Capitol, Barton Springs Pool, Mount Bonnell, LBJ Presidential Library, Austin City Limits Live at the Moody Theater

Day 11-12: Santa Fe, NM
- Must-see attraction: Georgia O'Keeffe Museum
- Additional highlights: Santa Fe Plaza, Loretto Chapel, Meow Wolf, Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Canyon Road art galleries

Day 13-14: Las Vegas, NV
- Must-see attraction: The Strip (including iconic hotels like Bellagio, MGM Grand, and the Strip's light show)
- Additional highlights: Fremont Street Experience, Red Rock Canyon, Hoover Dam, High Roller observation wheel, various shows and performances

This itinerary covers a diverse range of experiences across the United States, from the bustling streets of New York City to the serene landscapes of New Mexico, and the glitz and glamour of Las Vegas. Each city offers unique cultural, historical, and recreational opportunities, ensuring a memorable road trip adventure.
